projects.title: Squat Analysis System
projects.description: A real-time computer vision system that analyzes squat form using MediaPipe Pose estimation. It detects key body landmarks to assess depth, knee alignment, and back posture, providing instant feedback to correct form and prevent injury.

features: Depth analysis to ensure proper squat mechanics
Knee valgus detection to prevent ACL injuries
Back angle monitoring for neutral spine maintenance
Repetition counter with state machine logic

projects.title: Garbage Classification (TrashNet)
projects.description: Deep learning model for automatic waste segregation. classification. Utilizes Convolutional Neural Networks (CNNs) and Transfer Learning to classify garbage into categories like glass, paper, cardboard, plastic, metal, and trash, aiding in recycling efforts.

features: Data augmentation to handle class imbalance
High accuracy on the TrashNet dataset

projects.title: Tracking Barbell Exercises
projects.description: Machine learning project for analyzing barbell exercise movements from video data. Uses ML algorithms to track barbell motion, count repetitions, and extract key metrics such as range of motion, velocity, and path consistency to provide data-driven feedback on training performance.

features: ML-based barbell path tracking and analysis
Velocity and ROM calculation using data analytics
Automated repetition counting with ML algorithms
Form consistency analysis and pattern recognition
readme_summary.installation: pip install opencv-python pandas numpy scikit-learn

projects.title: Intelligence School Management
projects.description: A comprehensive web-based school management system. Modules include student registration, attendance tracking, grade management, teacher portals, and timetable scheduling. Built to streamline administrative tasks for educational institutions.

projects.title: MindWell AI
projects.description: Natural Language Processing (NLP) application for mental health support. Uses sentiment analysis, conversational AI, and text processing to provide empathetic chatbot interactions and personalized resource recommendations for mental wellness.

features: NLP-based sentiment analysis of user inputs
Conversational AI chatbot for immediate support
Text processing for mood tracking and analysis

projects.title: Heart Disease Analysis
projects.description: Data science project focused on predicting heart disease risk. Performs extensive Exploratory Data Analysis (EDA) on clinical datasets and builds classification models (Logistic Regression, Random Forest) to identify key risk factors.

projects.title: Face Detection System
projects.description: Robust face detection application using Haar Cascades or deep learning based detectors. Capable of detecting multiple faces in images and video streams in real-time.

projects.title: Artistic Image Filters
projects.description: Image processing application that applies artistic styles to photos. Uses convolution kernels and potentially style transfer techniques to transform ordinary images into artwork (sketches, oil painting effects, etc.).

projects.title: Multi-Stage Manufacturing Process
projects.description: Data science project optimizing a multi-stage continuous flow manufacturing system. Uses data analysis, statistical modeling, and optimization algorithms to minimize costs, reduce bottlenecks, and maximize throughput in production lines.

features: Statistical analysis and resource allocation modeling
readme_summary.installation: pip install pandas numpy matplotlib scipy

projects.title: Email Spam Classifier
projects.description: Natural Language Processing (NLP) project for email classification. Implements text preprocessing, feature extraction, and machine learning classifiers (Naive Bayes, SVM) to automatically detect and filter spam emails using advanced NLP techniques like TF-IDF vectorization.

features: Advanced text preprocessing (Tokenization, Stopword removal, Stemming)
High accuracy spam detection with confusion matrix visualization

projects.title: E-Commerce Cart System
projects.description: Backend implementation of an e-commerce shopping cart. Handles adding items, calculating totals, managing sessions, and checkout processes. Likely built with Java or PHP.

projects.title: Python Game Collection
projects.description: A collection of interactive games built with Python (likely Tkinter or PyGame). Includes classics like Tic-Tac-Toe, Blackjack, or similar logic games, demonstrating object-oriented programming.

projects.title: Web Intelligence School
projects.description: Web-based extension or variation of the school management system. Focuses on the web interface and potentially smarter features for educational analytics.

projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.description: This modern, responsive portfolio website. Built with React and Tailwind CSS to showcase my projects and skills with a professional design and smooth animations.
